rules_text:
Enchant creature
When Glimpse of Impossibility enters, you gain 2 life and draw two cards.
Aura Swap {1}{W}{U} [i]({1}{W}{U}: Exchange this Aura with an Aura card in your hand.)[/i]
notes:
Inspiration — Cosmic horror, dreams and visions

Mechanical Uniqueness — Aura swap return, aura with no effect to creature

Assistance — Auras with etbs
